about.title: About
about.description:
We all know that situation when you arrive at the dining hall and realize you should have eaten at home. This has happened to us many times, and that's why we decided to fix it üòº

On Transat, you'll find the dining hall menu updated daily, but that's not all!
No more endless waiting at the laundry room for your machine to finish, get notified when your machine is done üîî

We are Plug'IMT and we're determined to create an app made by students, for students üêô

New features will be added throughout the year to make Transat an essential part of the Nantes IMT campus ü•≥

We hope this app will save you as much as it saved us while we were developing it ü´∂

help.title: Help
help.description:
Any specific question, suggestion or issue?
Let us know using the form below or by joining the Whatsapp group ü´∂
help.subject: Subject
help.subjectRequired: Please provide a short description, it will help us understand your message
help.messagePlaceholder:
Hello, thank you for this amazing app ü§©

When I receive a notification and I click on it, the lunch menu doesn't appear.

Do you have any idea why?
help.messageRequired: You cannot send an empty message
help.messageSent: Thank you for your feedback, we will get back to you as soon as possible!
help.messageFailed: Failed to send your message, please try again later or reach us via WhatsApp
help.faq1Answer: To change your password, go to the account settings and click on 'Change password'. Enter your current password and the new password you want to set.
help.faq2Answer: To delete your account, go to the account settings and click on 'Delete account'. Please note that this action is irreversible and will delete all your data.
help.faq3Question: Is this app made by IMT students?
help.faq3Answer: Yes, this app is developed by IMT students as part of a project to improve the student experience on campus. We are constantly working to add new features and improve the app based on your feedback.
help.faq4Answer: If you want to contribute to the development of this app, you can join our team by contacting us on our WhatsApp group. We welcome any help, whether it's in development, design, or testing.
